title: Marathi News Maharashtra Times
description:
Download
Maharashtra Times App
and read the news in the Marathi language, get daily Marathi news updates from India and the world. We offer Bollywood gossips in Marathi, the latest news, Rashi Bhavishya in Marathi, Janam Kundali, Marathi songs, and a lot more.
Get up-to-date and fastest Marathi News from the most respected Marathi Newspaper - Maharashtra Times. The paper has been dispensing news in Marathi from the past 50 years and is the first choice of anyone wanting authentic information in Marathi. Owned by the Times Of India (BCCL) Group, we, at Times Internet Ltd., bring your favorite Marathi newspaper to your mobile. This app is the mobile manifestation of Maharashtra Times Marathi News Paper. It is extremely comprehensive as well as user-friendly. It effectively replicates and even surpasses the experience you get on the web in terms of functionality and content.
High-Quality Content:
· Local news from all 35 districts of Maharashtra.
. Live stock ticker and stock search
· Live cricket scores
· Film Reviews
· Stunning photo galleries
· Top videos from news, business, sports, entertainment and lifestyle
Comprehensive functionality:
· Share articles via - Email, Facebook, Twitter
· Comment on the news, add to favourites
· Write film reviews, rate movies
· Swipe across news, search for news
· Choose your font size
· Easy navigation across sections
Privacy Policy: http://maharashtratimes.indiatimes.com/feeds/policy.cms
